import React, { Component } from "react"; import '../App.css' import { MDBContainer, MDBTabPane, MDBTabContent, MDBNav, MDBNavItem, MDBNavLink } from "mdbreact"; import { fetchElectronics, fetchProducts, fetchFashion } from '../actions/index' import {connect} from 'react-redux' class TabsDefault extends Component { componentDidMount() { this.props.fetchProducts(); } state = { activeItem: "1" }; toggle = tab => e => { if (this.state.activeItem !== tab) { this.setState({ activeItem: tab }); if (this.state.activeItem == "1") { this.props.fetchFashion(); } else if (this.state.activeItem == "2") { this.props.fetchElectronics(); } else { this.props.fetchProducts(); } } }; render() { const { products } = this.props; console.log(products); return ( All Fashion Electronics
{products && products.map(products => (
New

{products.title}

  • ${products.price}
  • ${products.discount}
))}
{products && products.map(products => (
New

{products.title}

  • ${products.price}
  • ${products.discount}
))}
{products && products.map(products => (
New

{products.title}

  • ${products.price}
  • ${products.discount}
))}
); } } const mapStateToProps = state => { // console.log(state); return { products:state.products } } export default connect(mapStateToProps,{fetchProducts,fetchFashion,fetchElectronics}) (TabsDefault);
